name: David Murphy
label: Software Engineer
summary: Enthusiastic computer science student with a strong work ethic and a fervent passion for innovation. Proficient in Python, Java, and C++. My problem-solving and logical thinking abilities, coupled with excellent teamwork and communication skills, position me as a valuable asset in dynamic environments. I am excited about continuous growth, appreciating setbacks and critiques as catalysts for improvement. Eager to contribute to an organization, I aspire to make a lasting impact in the ever-evolving field of computer science.

work_experience.summary: Short summary about present job and what the position entails
highlights: Demonstrated hands-on expertise in hardware by efficiently building and configuring DataVaults (DV's), ensuring optimal performance and functionality.
Authored comprehensive Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs) for various tasks, including software upgrades for firewalls, configuration of switches, and the construction of DataVaults.
Configured switches to optimize network functionality, contributing to seamless and efficient data flow.
Spearheaded the building and configuration of DataVaults, implementing best practices to meet performance and security standards.
Maintained meticulous documentation to facilitate knowledge transfer and streamline future troubleshooting processes.

work_experience.summary: Short summary about previous job and what that position entailed
highlights: Assisted in identifying and implementing process improvements to enhance data accuracy and quality control measures, resulting in improved data integrity.
Conducted regular data audits and performed data cleaning activities to eliminate duplicates and inconsistencies, contributing to a more reliable and organized dataset.
Utilized Excel and other software tools to extract, transform, and load data, ensuring accurate and timely data entry.

projects.title: Swarm Intelligence for Lockheed Martin (Capstone)
projects.summary: Worked with a team of 5 to develop a swarm intelligence algorithm for Lockheed Martin using TurtleBots
highlights: Using TurtleBots and Raspberry Pi's, developed a swarm intelligence algorithm intended to be used for search and rescue missions.
Explored different algorithms such as Particle Swarm Optimization (PSO), Ant Colony Optimization (ACO), and Artificial Bee Colony (ABC).
Engineered a custom algorithm that combines the strengths of PSO and ACO to optimize search patterns.
Implemented the algorithm in Python, utilizing ROS (Robot Operating System) for communication and control of the TurtleBots.
Conducted extensive testing and simulation to validate the effectiveness of the swarm intelligence approach in various scenarios.

projects.title: Artificial Neural Networks - Artificial Intelligence
projects.summary: Implemented various types of artificial neural networks for classification, regression, and sequence prediction tasks.
highlights: Experience in developing feedforward, recurrent, and convolutional neural networks using frameworks such as TensorFlow and PyTorch
Skilled in training ANNs for tasks including classification, regression, and sequence prediction.
Familiarity with optimization techniques such as gradient descent, backpropagation, and adaptive learning rates.

projects.title: T5Summarize - Artificial Intelligence
projects.summary: fine-tunes a T5 model on the CNN/DailyMail dataset for text summarization, then serves an interactive demo via Streamlit.
highlights: Developed a text summarization application using the T5 model, fine-tuning it on the CNN/DailyMail dataset.
Implemented an interactive demo using Streamlit, allowing users to input text and receive summarized outputs.
Utilized Python and Hugging Face's Transformers library for model training and inference.
Demonstrated the effectiveness of the T5 model in generating concise and coherent summaries for various types of text inputs.

degrees: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
honors: The National Society of Leadership and Success

references.name: John Fritz
references.reference: John is a great boss and I learned a lot from him.
